AIPyS.CLI.set_parameters module

AIPyS.CLI.set_parameters.ensure_user_parameters()[source]

Ensure the user has their own copy of parameters.h5; if not, create it.

AIPyS.CLI.set_parameters.update_auto_parameters(parameter_updates, user_parameters_path)[source]

this function is used for updating h5 file based on results e.g. intercept and slope from model build

AIPyS.CLI.set_parameters.update_user_parameters(parameter_updates)[source]

Example function to update parameters in the user’s parameters.h5 file.
